category.name: wcf.acp.dashboard
category.item: Sort boxes to determine show order. You can enable or disable boxes by moving them between the boxes “Active Boxes” and “Disabled Boxes”.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: All marked BBCodes may be used within the signature.
Determines show order on team page, user rank and “Who is Online” marking based on highest priority.
Adjust the HTML formatting for members of this group in the “Who is Online” list. <strong>%s</strong> results in a bolder appearance.
Minimum period until members may rename themselves. [time in days]

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: You can obtain both your Client ID and Client Secret at GitHub.
You can obtain both your Consumer key and Consumer secret at Twitter.
You can obtain your APP-ID and Application Secret at Facebook.
You can obtain your Client ID and Client Secret at Google.
Enables support for Gravatars (“Global Recognized Avatar”).
Password complexity will be validated, unsafe passwords will be rejected.
List of names unavailable for registration, one name per line.
List of email addresses unavailable for registration, one address per line.
List of valid email addresses for registration, one address per line.
Disables registration for all users, new users may be created through an administrator.
Disclaimer must be explicitly accepted during registration.
Enable reCAPTCHA protection for “Send Email to User”
Maximum Height of Images in Signatures
List of user titles unavailable for members, one title per line.
Previous username will be additionally displayed for the given period. [time in days]
Page will be periodically refreshed. [time in seconds, 0 to disable]
Notifications will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]
Activities will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]
Profile visitors will be discarded if they are older than the given period. [time in days]

category.name: wcf.acp.user
category.item: You can select a predefined appearance or provide an own <abbr title="Cascading Style Sheets">CSS</abbr> class name.
Do you really want to delete the user rank “{$userRank->rankTitle|language}”?
Path must be either relative to WCF’s directory or absolute.
Rank might be optionally restricted to a specific gender.
Required amount of activity points to obtain this rank.
Number of times the rank image will be repeated.
Rank is restricted to members of the selected user groups.
TODO: {#$usersAwaitingApproval} Benutzer {if $usersAwaitingApproval == 1}wartet auf seine{else}warten auf ihre{/if} Aktivierung.

category.name: wcf.user
category.item: Account is connected with a 3rd party website, password cannot be requested.
Forces a specific style instead of the default one.
Username must be {REGISTER_USERNAME_MIN_LENGTH} up to {REGISTER_USERNAME_MAX_LENGTH} characters long.

{if REGISTER_ENABLE_PASSWORD_SECURITY_CHECK && REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH}Password must be at least {REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH} characters.{else}A secure password should be at least 8 characters long.{/if}
You must provide your username or email address to request a new password. Contact the site’s administrator if you need assistance.
“{$email}” is not used by any account.
Password has been requested at least once in the past 24 hours. For security reasons you must wait at least {#$hours} hour{if $hours != 1}s{/if} before requesting it again.

Dear {@$username},
if you have lost your password you can request a new one using the link below. Request a new password: {link controller='NewPassword' encode=false}u={@$userID}&k={@$key}{/link}
If you have not lost your password, you can safely ignore this email.
Have a nice day, Your {@PAGE_TITLE|language} team
You should receive an email shortly.
You should receive an email with your password shortly.
Heads up! You’re editing your own user account, careless changes might lock you out!
Please confirm changes with your password!

You may change your username every {$renamePeriod} days. Changes between upper or lower case are always allowed. {if $__wcf->getUser()->lastUsernameChange}Last change was {@$__wcf->getUser()->lastUsernameChange|date}.{/if}
Do you really want to delete your user account and all associated, private data?
Your user account will be delete on {$quitStarted+7*86400|date}. Please enable this option if you wish to abort deletion.
Note: Post, Attachments and similar content will remain even after your account was deleted.
Your user account will be deleted on {TIME_NOW+7*86400|date}. During this period you can abort deletion on this page.

Due to security reasons every password must be at least {REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH} characters long{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR}{* *}and contain {* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE}lower-case letters{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR},{else} and{/if} {/if}upper-case letters{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR},{else} and{/if} {/if}digits{/if}{* *}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHAR}{if REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_LOWER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_UPPER_CASE || REGISTER_PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_DIGIT} and {/if}special chars{/if}{/if}.
Your new email address must be verified first. You should’ve received an email sent to your new email address containing an activation link. Open the link to verify your new email address.
You have provided an invalid activation code. Click the button below if you wish to request a new activation code.
You may provide a different email address or leave it empty to send the code to the same email address again.
Activiation code has been sent to “{$email}”.
An email containing the 9-digit activation code was sent to “{$__wcf->user->email}”.
Username was already changed within the last {#$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.profile.renamePeriod')} day.
You may enter a custom user title.
Title exceeded the maximum length of {#USER_TITLE_MAX_LENGTH} characters.
Your criteria did not match any member.

category.name: wcf.user.register
category.item:
Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
An email was sent to “{$user->email}” containing a one-time link to verify your account and ultimately completing your registration.

Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
Your account is awating approval from an administrator.
A notification will be sent once your account has been approved.

Thank you for registering, {$user->username}.
Your registration is now completed.
Your user account is not activated yet. You must complete the activation process first.

The registration and use of this forum is completely free for you. Press “Accept” if you agree with the rules mentioned below. You will then be able to register.

Even though administrators and moderators of “{@PAGE_TITLE|language}” try to delete or edit all the unwanted posts, it is impossible for them to check all the posts. All the posts express the opinion of the author, the owners of “{@PAGE_TITLE}” and WoltLab GmbH (the developers of Burning Board) cannot be held responsible for the content of those posts.

By registering, you agree not to post messages that are vulgar, impolite, disrespectful or that express (extreme) political views or (verbal) law offences.

Additionally, the Administrators and Moderators of this board can edit or even delete your account for any reason.

Enjoy your stay at {@PAGE_TITLE}!

category.name: wcf.user.usersOnline
category.item: User Profile of “{$user->username}”

category.name: wcf.user.3rdparty
category.item: Access to your GitHub account has been rejected.
You’re creating an account through  GitHub.
Your user account has been connected with GitHub.
Your GitHub account is already connected to a different user.
Your account is no longer connected with GitHub.
Access to your Twitter account has been rejected.
You’re creating an account through  Twitter.
Your user account has been connected with Twitter.
Your Twitter account is already connected to a different user.
Your account is no longer connected with Twitter.
Access to your Facebook account has been rejected.
You’re creating an account through  Facebook.
Your user account has been connected with Facebook.
Your Facebook account is already connected to a different user.
Your account is no longer connected with Facebook.
Access to your Google account has been rejected.
You’re creating an account through  Google.
Your user account has been connected with Google.
Your Google account is already connected to a different user.
Your account is no longer connected with Google.

category.name: wcf.user.avatar
category.item: The administrators {if $__wcf->user->avatarID || $__wcf->user->enableGravatar}have banned your avatar and {/if}disallowed you from using an avatar{if $__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}: {$__wcf->user->disableAvatarReason}{/if}.

You may use the following file extensions “{"\n"|str_replace:', ':$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.allowedFileExtensions')}” for your avatar with a maximum file size of {@$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.profile.avatar.maxSize')|filesize}. The minimum dimensions are 48×48 pixel, it is recommend to provide a dimension of {@MAX_AVATAR_WIDTH}×{@MAX_AVATAR_HEIGHT} pixel. Any avatar that exceeds this limit will be scaled down if possible.
Gravatar (Global Recognized Avatar) provides a globally reusable avatar connected with your email address “{$__wcf->user->email}”. Visit www.gravatar.com to set up or change your avatar.
Your email address is not connected with a gravatar.
Your currently used avatar will be deleted.
Image does not match the allowed file extensions.
Image dimensions are below the minimum sizes.

category.name: wcf.user.notification
category.item: if (data.returnValues.count == 0) { "No Notifications" } else if (data.returnValues.count == 1) { "1 Notification" } else { data.returnValues.count + " Notifications" }
Do you really want to discard all notifications?

category.name: wcf.user.profile
category.item: {if $userID == $__wcf->getUser()->userID}You did not provide any details yet.{else}There are no details visible to you.{/if}
There are no recent activities available yet.

category.name: wcf.user.option
category.item: Wszyscy użytkownicy mogą zobaczyć twój wiek.
Wprowadź swój ID Google Plus o długości 21 cyfr.

category.name: wcf.user.mail
category.item: Use my email address as sender address, the recipient can directly reply to me.

category.name: wcf.user
category.item: Nazwa użytkownika musi zawierać co najmniej {REGISTER_USERNAME_MIN_LENGTH} znaków i maksymalnie {REGISTER_USERNAME_MAX_LENGTH} znaków.

{if REGISTER_ENABLE_PASSWORD_SECURITY_CHECK && REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH}Hasło musi zawierać {REGISTER_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH} znaków.{else}Bezpieczne hasło powinno zawierać co najmniej 8 znaków.{/if}
Nie znaleziono użytkownika z podanym adresem e-mail: “{$email}”

Wysyłałeś już w ciągu ostatnih 24h prośbę o zmianę hasła. Ze względów bezpieczeństwa możesz prosić o przypomnienie hasła raz dziennie. Możesz ponownie poprosić o hasło do tego konta za {#$hours} godzin(ę).
Za chwilę otrzymasz e-maila z dalszymi wskazówkami.
Wkrótce otrzymasz e-mail z owym hasłem.
Edytujesz własne konto użytkownika. Niektóre ustawienia mogą zablokować dostęp do twojego konta. Proszę być ostrożnym!
Proszę wprowadzić swoje hasło dla potwierdzenia!
Możesz zmienić swoją nazwę użytkownika tylko raz na {$renamePeriod} dni.
Czy na pewno chcesz trwale usunąć swoje konto i wszystkie dane osobowe?
Twoje konto zostanie usunięte za {$quitStarted+7*86400|date}. Włącz tę opcję, jeśli chcesz anulować usunięcie.
Uwaga: Ta czynność nie powoduje usunięcia wiadomości, załączników i inne treści utworzonych przez użytkowników.

category.name: wcf.user.notification
category.item: if (data.returnValues.count == 0) { "Brak powiadomień" } else if (data.returnValues.count == 1) { "Jedno powiadomienie" } else { data.returnValues.count + " powiadomień" }
